code: import React from'react';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import'./Dashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const{currentUser}=useAuth();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-welcome",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Welcome, ",currentUser.firstName,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Your role: ",currentUser.role.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+currentUser.role.slice(1)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-cards",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"My Tasks"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"placeholder-text",children:"Task management functionality will be implemented in future updates."})]}),(currentUser.role==='admin'||currentUser.role==='manager')&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Manage Schedules"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"placeholder-text",children:"Schedule management functionality will be implemented in future updates."})]}),currentUser.role==='admin'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"System Statistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"placeholder-text",children:"System statistics will be implemented in future updates."})]})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
